body_html: @pisymbol Thanks for confirming. Sorry I tried to build r1.2 with bazel 0.5.0 which should be OK, although recent r1.2 doesn't build on the raspberry any longer - it used to. I'm trying to build bazel 0.7.0 now with r1.3, but maybe I'll just head to the current master. Will report back with story of success or dismal failure :)
